document.full_text: four men who threw anti-government leaflets in havana's revolution square were sentenced on tuesday to up to five years in prison by a cuban court, family members said.
document.title: cuba dissidents sentenced to prison for leaflets
lines_and_colors: four men who threw anti-government leaflets in havana's revolution square were sentenced on tuesday to up to five years in prison by a cuban court, family members said.
